name: Sunflora
description: The Sun Pokémon. Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.
